SELECT LAST_INSERT_ROWID()
insert into fmea_resume (structure_name, step, before_change, after_change, create_date, create_by, `desc`, fmea_id) values (#{structureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beforeChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afterChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update fmea_resume set structure_name = #{structureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step = #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, before_change = #{beforeChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, after_change = #{afterChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_id = #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, structure_name, step, before_change, after_change, create_date, create_by, `desc`, fmea_id from fmea_resume where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, structure_name, step, before_change, after_change, create_date, create_by, `desc`, fmea_id from fmea_resume
